<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve a bucket's headers"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"head"}
  path={"/{bucketName}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



A `HEAD` issued to a bucket will return the headers for that bucket.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>
